tag_list: photographer, web-designer, marketing, creative-director, research, medical, doctor
overview:
Muhammad Adnan Jabbar Ch was born in Lahore, Pakistan. He completed his high school from “The Punjab School, Township, Lahore, Pakistan”, college from “Punjab College of Sciences, Lahore, Pakistan” and finished his Bachelor’s Degree from “Dalian Medical University, Dalian, Liaoning, China”. He also completed his Bachelor’s in Multimedia & TV Production / Creative Development from “National College of Arts, Lahore, Pakistan”.

Adnan Jabbar spent most of his life time in Lahore (Pak) and then moved to China for higher studies. During his phase of study he joined with many firms both national and international.

His first web-development project was with JBSK Productions for developing artists websites and brand logos / product branding. After that he joined in with Pak Sound Networks which is being operated by a mid-level company in Norway. After expanding his experience in Web Development he stepped in the Photography line. Started as a night life photographer was then hired by Focus on Dalian Magazine company which he was connected for a small period of time. During that mean time he was appointed as Foreign Manager & Gen Manager for famous night life places around Dalian.

As after finishing his work with Focus on Dalian Magazine he immidiately got an offer from Kelton Magazine (Dalian) to work there as a Photographer / Web Designer and Graphic Designer. He spend his quite a bit time in that company and in the meanwhile he opened his own branch of Bloc Networks in Dalian named as “WeLiveInDalian” which gain success in the city because of it’s interactive design and services. The website is appreciated by many news & media companies in Dalian. After his success in WeLiveInDalian he was appointed as a Director for International Marketing & Product Branding by Bloc International Networks, Norway. As well as due to his work he was also hired by Elle China as a photographer and Vogue China as Asst. Photographer.

In 2009 he joined in with Ink Magazine ASIA and started working on the position of Creative Director of Development & Design.
